meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny -

Okay, okay, I'll try to be serious for a hot second. The Talos Principle 2 has finally arrived, and I'm here to give you the lowdown on this philosophical puzzle game extravaganza! Now, before we dive in, let me just say that I'm no expert (hello, self-deprecating humor alert!). But hey, who needs expertise when you have wit, charm, and a whole lot of enthusiasm?

Now, onto the good stuff! The Talos Principle 2 is like that one friend who always challenges you to think outside the box – literally. The puzzles are clever, the philosophical themes are thought-provoking, and the narrative is... well, let's just say it'll keep you guessing (wink-wink). But don't worry if your head starts spinning; I'm here for you!

So, what did those fancy-pants critics have to say about this game? Well, IGN gave it an 80, saying puzzles are meant to be solved and that this game does just that – simultaneously exploring philosophy! GameSpot clocked in at 90, praising the game's ability to make you think about humanity, choices, and the apocalypse (because, priorities).

Game Informer scored 88, noting that The Talos Principle II is long (34 hours, to be exact), but well-made. Worth Playing gave it a 90, saying it's clever, complements the old tools, and has some satisfaction in store. SpazioGames ranked it an 80, advising fans of puzzle games to sink their teeth into it. Eurogamer also gave it an 80, calling it bold and thought-provoking. And GamingTrend scored a perfect 90, saying it's deep, philosophical, and narrative-driven.

Now, I'm no expert (remember?), but it seems like these critics were generally impressed with The Talos Principle II. And honestly? So am I! As someone who loves a good puzzle game and isn't afraid to think outside the box, this game is an absolute delight.

So, what are you waiting for? Get ready to challenge your brain (and maybe even your emotions) with The Talos Principle 2!
